title: Increasing Diversity in Innovation Virtual Conference
description:
Findings by the [US Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO)](https://www.uspto.gov/) and leading researchers show that women, people of color, and veterans are significantly underrepresented as US patent inventors. All of the data indicates that the US has missed out on millions of inventors, impacting national innovation and economic growth.\
\
On July 26-29, the [US Intellectual Property Alliance](https://www.usipalliance.org/) and [UC Berkeley Fung Institute](http://funginstitute.berkeley.edu/) will host a virtual conference bringing together the USPTO, corporate legal teams, innovators, industry associations and key stakeholders across the country to focus on increasing engagement of underrepresented inventors.\
